document_notes.text:
This update for samba fixes the following issues:

The following security vulnerability was fixed:

- CVE-2018-10858: smbc_urlencode helper function is a subject to buffer overflow (bsc#1103411)

The following other bugs were fixed:

- Fix libnss_wins.so.2 link libreplace with rpath (bsc#1054849)

notes.text: A heap-buffer overflow was found in the way samba clients processed extra long filename in a directory listing. A malicious samba server could use this flaw to cause arbitrary code execution on a samba client. Samba versions before 4.6.16, 4.7.9 and 4.8.4 are vulnerable.
